ComicInfo.Summary: Rick is finally getting settled into his new life. He’s got a roof over his head, and a pretty secure shelter, and he’s surrounded by people who he’s come to know as friends. Over all, life is good, and after the last few months he’s been through he welcomes this change. But things can’t stay like this forever. Something bad looms just beyond the horizon. Something really bad.
ComicInfo.Title: Miles Behind Us, Pt. 5
